mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.images AS "images", a.brand_id AS "brandId", b.brand_name AS "commodityBrand.brandName", a.tag_id AS "tagId", c.name AS "commodityTag.name", a.purchasing_price AS "purchasingPrice", a.original_cost AS "originalCost", a.selling_price AS "sellingPrice", a.vip_price AS "vipPrice", a.specification AS "specification", a.amount AS "amount", a.used_amount AS "usedAmount", a.stock_amount AS "stockAmount", a.sales_volume AS "salesVolume", a.effect AS "effect", a.applause_rate AS "applauseRate", a.comments AS "comments", a.health_beans AS "healthBeans", a.is_market AS "isMarket", a.is_deleted AS "isDeleted", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.update_time AS "updateDate", a.account_id AS "accountId", d.classify_id AS "goodsClassify.classifyId", d.second_classify_id AS "goodsClassify.secondClassifyId", d.reclassify_id AS "goodsClassify.reclassifyId", d.goods_id AS "goodsClassify.goodsId", e.id AS "goodsInfo.id", f.id AS "goodsSpecification.id"

LEFT JOIN md_goods_brand b ON a.brand_id = b.id LEFT JOIN md_tag c ON a.tag_id = c.id LEFT JOIN md_goods_classify d ON a.id = d.goods_id LEFT JOIN md_goods_info e ON a.id = e.id LEFT JOIN md_goods_specification f ON a.id = f.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mb_goods( name, images, brand_id, tag_id, purchasing_price, original_cost, selling_price, vip_price, specification, amount, used_amount, stock_amount, sales_volume, effect, applause_rate, comments, health_beans, is_market, is_deleted, create_time, update_time, account_id )VALUES ( #{name}, #{images}, #{brandId}, #{tagId}, #{purchasingPrice}, #{originalCost}, #{sellingPrice}, #{vipPrice}, #{specification}, #{amount}, #{usedAmount}, #{stockAmount}, #{salesVolume}, #{effect}, #{applauseRate}, #{comments}, #{healthBeans}, #{isMarket}, #{isDeleted}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{accountId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mb_goods SET name = #{name}, images = #{images}, brand_id = #{brandId}, tag_id = #{tagId}, purchasing_price = #{purchasingPrice}, original_cost = #{originalCost}, selling_price = #{sellingPrice}, vip_price = #{vipPrice}, specification = #{specification}, amount = #{amount}, used_amount = #{usedAmount}, stock_amount = #{stockAmount}, sales_volume = #{salesVolume}, effect = #{effect}, applause_rate = #{applauseRate}, comments = #{comments}, health_beans = #{healthBeans}, is_market = #{isMarket}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, account_id = #{accountId} WHERE id=#{id}
